text: Amanullinic acid is a cyclic nonribosomal peptide. It is an amatoxin, all of which are found in several members of the mushroom genus Amanita. Amanullinic acid is relatively non-toxic( oral >20 mg/kg in mice). ==Toxicology== Like other amatoxins, amanullinic acid is an inhibitor of RNA polymerase II. ==See also== *Mushroom poisoning ==References== ==External links== *Amatoxins REVISED Category:Peptides Category:Amatoxins Category:Hepatotoxins
title: Amanullinic acid
